languages.text: "Я не знаю... Не знаю! Эта тварь — одна из Кошмаров, я уже видел подобных ей! Закованные в цепи, вечно глядящие... всегда сопровождали своих хозяев во время кровавых расправ. Просто стояли и смотрели... Всегда. Но почему эта тварь теперь на Альбрисе? Как... Как ее снять?"

traits.locale_text: "Я не знаю... Не знаю! Эта тварь — одна из Кошмаров, я уже видел подобных ей! Закованные в цепи, вечно глядящие... всегда сопровождали своих хозяев во время кровавых расправ. Просто стояли и смотрели... Всегда. Но почему эта тварь теперь на Альбрисе? Как... Как ее снять?"

languages.text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"
languages.original_text: "Я не знаю... Не знаю! Эта тварь — одна из Кошмаров, я уже видел подобных ей! Закованные в цепи, вечно глядящие... всегда сопровождали своих хозяев во время кровавых расправ. Просто стояли и смотрели... Всегда. Но почему эта тварь теперь на Альбрисе? Как... Как ее снять?"

They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

"I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

languages.text: 「わかりません…わかりません！これは悪夢です。以前にも似た者を見たことがあります！鎖に縛られ、無気力に見つめていた…彼らは常に惨たらしい処刑の間、その主と一緒に付き添っていました。ただそこに立って、見つめていた…常に見つめていました。でもなぜこの生物がアルブリスに憑いているのですか？どうやって…どうやってあれを取り除けばいいのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

traits.locale_text: 「わかりません…わかりません！これは悪夢です。以前にも似た者を見たことがあります！鎖に縛られ、無気力に見つめていた…彼らは常に惨たらしい処刑の間、その主と一緒に付き添っていました。ただそこに立って、見つめていた…常に見つめていました。でもなぜこの生物がアルブリスに憑いているのですか？どうやって…どうやってあれを取り除けばいいのですか？」

languages.text: « Je sais pas... Je sais pas ! Cette créature est un cauchemar, mais j'en avais jamais vu de telle ! Enchaînées, nous observant de manière désintéressée... elles accompagnaient toujours leurs maîtres lors de leurs horribles exécutions. Elles restaient dans un coin et se contentaient d'assister à la scène... Elles ne faisaient rien d'autre. Mais pourquoi cette chose s'est-elle accrochée à Albris ? Comment faire pour la retirer ? »
languages.original_text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

traits.locale_text: « Je sais pas... Je sais pas ! Cette créature est un cauchemar, mais j'en avais jamais vu de telle ! Enchaînées, nous observant de manière désintéressée... elles accompagnaient toujours leurs maîtres lors de leurs horribles exécutions. Elles restaient dans un coin et se contentaient d'assister à la scène... Elles ne faisaient rien d'autre. Mais pourquoi cette chose s'est-elle accrochée à Albris ? Comment faire pour la retirer ? »

languages.text: “我不知道……我不知道！这东西也是梦魇，我以前也见过这样的玩意儿！被锁链捆着，无精打采地看着……那些梦魇残忍行刑的过程中，这种东西也陪在旁边，但只是在那里盯着看而已……只是盯着看而已。可现在，这只怪物怎么会在阿布里斯头上？该……该怎么把它弄下来？”
languages.original_text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

traits.locale_text: “我不知道……我不知道！这东西也是梦魇，我以前也见过这样的玩意儿！被锁链捆着，无精打采地看着……那些梦魇残忍行刑的过程中，这种东西也陪在旁边，但只是在那里盯着看而已……只是盯着看而已。可现在，这只怪物怎么会在阿布里斯头上？该……该怎么把它弄下来？”

languages.text: «No lo sé... ¡No lo sé! Es una pesadilla; ¡no es la primera vez que veo algo así! Esas cadenas, esa mirada en pena... En sus escabrosas ejecuciones siempre van acompañadas de sus amos. Se limitan a contemplar la estampa... Nunca se mueven. Pero ¿por qué ahora está esa criatura encima de Albris? ¿Cómo... se la quitamos?».
languages.original_text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

traits.locale_text: «No lo sé... ¡No lo sé! Es una pesadilla; ¡no es la primera vez que veo algo así! Esas cadenas, esa mirada en pena... En sus escabrosas ejecuciones siempre van acompañadas de sus amos. Se limitan a contemplar la estampa... Nunca se mueven. Pero ¿por qué ahora está esa criatura encima de Albris? ¿Cómo... se la quitamos?».

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht ... Ich weiß es nicht! Dieses Ding ist ein Albtraum, wie ich ihn noch nie gesehen habe! In Ketten gefesselt, teilnahmslos beobachtend ... Sie haben ihre Meister immer zu den blutigen Hinrichtungen begleitet. Sie standen einfach da und haben gestarrt ... Immer nur gestarrt. Aber warum reitet diese Kreatur jetzt auf Albris? Wie ... wie kriegen wir sie da runter?"
languages.original_text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht ... Ich weiß es nicht! Dieses Ding ist ein Albtraum, wie ich ihn noch nie gesehen habe! In Ketten gefesselt, teilnahmslos beobachtend ... Sie haben ihre Meister immer zu den blutigen Hinrichtungen begleitet. Sie standen einfach da und haben gestarrt ... Immer nur gestarrt. Aber warum reitet diese Kreatur jetzt auf Albris? Wie ... wie kriegen wir sie da runter?"

languages.text: "Bilmiyorum... Bilmiyorum! Bu şey tam bir Kâbus, benzerlerini görmüştüm! Zincire burulmuş, umursamazca izliyorlardı... Kanlı infazlar sırasında her zaman efendilerine eşlik ederlerdi. Öylece durup bakarlardı... Sadece bakarlardı. Fakat bu yaratık neden şimdi Albris'in üstünde? Onu nasıl... Nasıl çıkaracağız?"
languages.original_text: "I do not know... I don't know! This thing is a Nightmare, I have seen the likes of it before! Bound in chains, listlessly watching... They always accompanied their masters during the gory executions. They just stood there and stared... Always stared. But why is this creature riding Albris now? How... how do we take it off?"

traits.locale_text: "Bilmiyorum... Bilmiyorum! Bu şey tam bir Kâbus, benzerlerini görmüştüm! Zincire burulmuş, umursamazca izliyorlardı... Kanlı infazlar sırasında her zaman efendilerine eşlik ederlerdi. Öylece durup bakarlardı... Sadece bakarlardı. Fakat bu yaratık neden şimdi Albris'in üstünde? Onu nasıl... Nasıl çıkaracağız?"
